data: Where the road to the west from Birralong dips down to the valley of Boulder Creek, a selection stretches out on the left-hand side, well cleared and fenced, and with the selectorâ€™s homestead standing back a couple of hundred yards from the main road.

Where the road to the west from Birralong dips down to the valley of Boulder Creek, a selection stretches out on the left-hand side, well cleared and fenced, and with the selector's homestead standing back a couple of hundred yards from the main road.
Colonial Born: A Tale of the Queensland bush
Scott, G. Firth, 1862?-1935; Spence, Percy F. S. (Percy Frederick Seaton), 1868-1933 [Illustrator]
